Unequipping shields will give you a 60 minute attack cooldown to prevent users from unequipping their shield bopping someone
These new questions aren't insanely obscure and difficult like the previous.

Random airdrops carrying a new item `care_package` will occasionally drop in a servers channel! Open the `care_package` to receive 3-15 items with a high chance for legendary items. Currently only available to players in the official Lootcord server, but expect this to be released to all servers after we're finished testing it.
ðŸ”¹ **Cooldowns are now persistent after account deletion.**
ðŸ”¹ *New* inventory **banners** that can be equipped and unequipped.

Everyone will start with the recruit banner but you can buy more with the buy command. Check information for a banner using the `item` command, they are treated the same as items except: **They don't take inventory space** and **they don't show in your inventory, instead they are displayed in the `profile` command.** Right now the only banners available are: `recruit`, `looter`, `killer`, and `hitman` but there's room for more in the future.

I felt like the profile command didn't have much purpose so what better than to allow everyone to express themselves on their profile! Change your status with the `setstatus` command, it even supports unicode emoji ðŸ˜ƒ
ðŸ”¹ **XP no longer rewarded per message sent.**

Instead, XP will be given for every box opened and kills. The XP you get from the box depends on: **what item you get from the box**, and **the type of box opened**. Keep in mind `xp_potion`'s are still a thing. Why change this??? To add more incentive to opening lower-tier boxes and discourage spamming.
The bot now supports language files. If you'd like to help translate the bot, join our official discord and grab a copy of the translation file!
ðŸ”¹***"HOLD UP, MY ACCOUNT WAS DELETED?!?!?!"***
Don't worry, this is a side effect of moving to a new database, **IF YOU'D LIKE YOUR ACCOUNT RESTORED, MESSAGE THE BOT**
